# childeswordfreq

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The `childeswordfreq` package provides tools to extract word frequencies and speaker role breakdowns from the CHILDES database, along with dataset-level summaries.

## Installation

```r
# CRAN
install.packages("childeswordfreq")

# Or install the development version from GitHub
remotes::install_github("n-albudoor/childeswordfreq")
```
